thread.title: A weekend with a view
thread.title_full: A weekend with a view - Review of Misty Waves Boutique Hotel Hermanus, Hermanus, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: MDEnterprises
title: A weekend with a view
text: We had the "View Room" for the weekend and what a room! Looking over the ocean from a clean, crisp, well designed slice of heaven. The staff are friendly and helpful. The buffet breakfast was scrumptious, arrive with an apatite. I'm not much of a one for words but do yourself a favor and spend a weekend here.
